title: Self-Directed Learning Design for Enhancing Higher Education Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: College-level social science foundational knowledge and information retrieval experience
context.additional_context: Flexible learning schedules and personal device utilization for working learners, with continuous feedback via formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can progressively apply information literacy according to the six ACRL Framework core competencies (inquiry, search, evaluation, creation, research, dissemination)
Learners can critically assess the credibility and validity of information sources based on critical thinking
Learners can systematically collect, process, and share information using digital tools appropriate for social science research topics
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
